name: KVK TEAM
overview:
The KVK Team was organized in 2012 by private investors, who are interested in the innovative companies’ development in the IT field. We’re focused on the young in this field Russian market. Our mission is to help talented and firm of purpose entrepreneurs in creating not just some viable business, but in realizing their the most daring and brilliant ideas. We create companies, which become the leaders in their field on the native IT market and successfully enter the international level.

The headquarters of our company is in Los Angeles. During our tenure, we managed to form the gifted and professional community in the scope of IT, marketing, logistics and management. We consider this is our main achievement. The well-defined, coordinated team work helps make decisions quickly, work out and incarnate the strategy of business’ development step-by-step.

Two large-scale projects were successfully implemented by our team. We’re going to start up five projects more soon. These facts prove we deserve confidence.

In business angels we believe! We don’t waste our resources for nothing. The ideas we put into the life are extraordinary and innovative. The accurate selection helps us to find such projects. We give a chance to the purposeful entrepreneurs become successful businessmen. With us, you can be successful without the initial capital and resources. Only thanks to your ideas and the strong desire to bring them to life.

On conditions that, the IT scope in Russia is still underdeveloped, it’s very risky to start up a business independently. Even the brightest idea cannot meet your expectations without the proper strategy and good management. We can help you to implement the strategic plans quickly and without mistakes. Our team is ready to share their experience, knowledge and business contacts. We help in finding the common ground with your partners and in making the constructive dialogue with the investors. With us your idea becomes a reality.
